ygData.subject: Re: Getting a GUILD up and going...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, Sorry for the delay in response, but I was out camping for a few days (it s nice to get away from EQ once in a while). I think the idea for a guild is
ygData.messageBody:
Hello,

Sorry for the delay in response, but I was out camping for a few days (it's
nice to get away from EQ once in a while). I think the idea for a guild is an
interesting idea but one mainly for people who like to role play which really
doesn't include me. I also am not keen on the idea of starting up yet another
character since my "primary" one has finally reached the upper teens and with
it some decent power. I do however wish you all luck and best wishes with
starting up new characters and the guild but don't think I'll be able to join.
I will however offer hospitality and help to any of you who happen to be on
the server I play (with many friends, another reason I'm not in a rush to jump
servers) Innoruuk. Should any of you ever pop on there feel free to send a
hello.

JSpectre @ Innoruuk

Johnathan Spectre
email: jspectre@...
